Articles.Content: I\'ve been seeing this 'engine control' window in some videos and screenshots of KSP. Where do I get it? I really want it but I can\'t seem to find it. :\'(

Could be Mechjeb.

Btw, this\'d go in Addon Requests and Help; Support is for game issues.
The engine control dialog is for MuMechLib engines, and doesn\'t do anything for stock engines.

You can add it to other engines. Get MuMechLib (save in plugins folder), go to your engines part.cfg, change [tt]module =LiquidEngine [/tt]to [tt]module = MuMechVariableEngine [/tt]and add [tt]group = [something][/tt]
